description:
Batman: Arkham Origins Blackgate is
a 2.5-D game developed by Armature
Studios that brings the Batman
Arkham experience for the first time to
Nintendo 3DS™. A companion game
to Batman: Arkham Origins, players
can continue the storyline of the
console version and discover more
details of the Dark Knight’s past.
name:
Batman:
Arkham Origins Blackgate
